backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing authorization, blob storage mixins, and core features for user profiles, messaging, and friend lists.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old state (including calls) to the new actor state without call data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing removed call-related frontend components and app renaming to MessageCenter.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose and recent updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and dark mode theme variables defining the app's OKLCH color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the document title to MessageCenter and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, authentication gating, theme provider, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders an individual chat message with reply preview, timestamp, and optional video content.
frontend/src/components/chat/VideoMessag: Displays a video message with loading state and interactive star rating tied to local rating hooks.
frontend/src/components/common/Avatar.ts: Renders a user avatar image with size options, falling back to a default image if none is provided.
Provides the main application layout with top bar, bottom navigation, user menu, and routing hooks.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Modal for selecting or capturing a new profile picture, converting it to an ExternalBlob and uploading it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time users to create a profile, handling username and display name submission.
frontend/src/components/ratings/StarRati: Interactive star rating component supporting hover, half-stars, read-only mode, and size variations.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoRecor: Modal for recording video via webcam, handling recording state, preview, cancellation, and sending as ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoTrimm: Video preview and trimming UI that allows selecting start/end points but sends the full original blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching and mutating the current user's profile and profile picture via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInboxFriendProfile: Fetches and caches profiles for a list of friend principals using multiple parallel queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for messages, friends, profiles, and user search, including mutations and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoRatings.ts: Implements a mock video rating hook storing ratings in localStorage with simple averaging and update logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global colors and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CallsPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for calls functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ChatDetailPage.tsx: Displays a chat thread with a user, handles sending messages, replies, video attachments, and auto‑scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Manages the friends list with add, remove, best‑friend toggle, and search features using dialogs and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Shows a list of friends as chat entries, loading associated profiles and navigating to chat threads.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders the user profile page with editable username/displayName and a profile picture picker, using hooks to load and update the caller's profile.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for changing dark mode and theme color preferences, saving updates to the user profile.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Displays a sign-in screen and triggers Internet Identity login with loading and error states.
frontend/src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx: Supplies theme context (dark mode and primary color), syncing values with the user profile and applying them to the document.
frontend/src/utils/blob.ts: Converts File or Blob objects into ExternalBlob instances by reading their byte data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors via CSS variables, typography and animation plugins, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, features, requirements, notes, and tracked issues.
